text: melum, "enkal iraivane! Enkal pavankalaiyum enkal kariyankalil nankal varampu miric ceytavarraiyum mannit tarulvayaka! Enkal patankalai urutiyay irukkac ceyvayaka! Kahpirkalin kuttattarukku etiraka enkalukku ni utavi purivayaka" enpatait tavira (im'matiri cantarppankalil) avarkal kuriyatu veretum illai
